hooks.command: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ "$branch" = "main" ]; then echo 'You are on the main branch. Create a feature branch first.' >&2; exit 2; fi
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | xargs -I {} pnpm biome check --write --unsafe {} 2>/dev/null || true

printf '
--- Pre-commit checklist ---
  pnpm biome check .
  pnpm tsc --noEmit
  pnpm test
---
'
